tool_description: An interface to database which tracks the work items such as issues, features, bugs etc. Provides APIs to retrieve, summarize, change the database related to production cycle.
name: agent007
title: agent007

api_list.name: works_list
api_list.description: Returns a list of IDs work items matching the request. To know more about the works, use the summarize_objects API.

required_parameters.name: owned_by
required_parameters.description: Filters for work owned by any of these users

required_parameters.name: issue.priority
required_parameters.description: Filters for issues with any of the provided priorities. Allowed values: p0, p1, p2, p3

optional_parameters.name: created_by
optional_parameters.description: Filters for work created by any of these users

optional_parameters.name: applies_to_part
optional_parameters.description: Filters for work belonging to any of the provided parts

optional_parameters.name: issue.rev_orgs
optional_parameters.description: Filters for issues with any of the provided Rev organizations

optional_parameters.name: stage.name
optional_parameters.description: Filters for records in the provided stage(s) by name

optional_parameters.name: ticket.needs_response
optional_parameters.description: Filters for tickets that need a response

optional_parameters.name: ticket.rev_org
optional_parameters.description: Filters for tickets associated with any of the provided Rev organizations

optional_parameters.name: ticket.severity
optional_parameters.description: Filters for tickets with any of the provided severities. Allowed values: blocker, high, low, medium

optional_parameters.name: ticket.source_channel
optional_parameters.description: Filters for tickets with any of the provided source channels

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Filters for work of the provided types. Allowed values: issue, ticket, task

api_list.name: summarize_objects
api_list.description: Summarizes a list of objects. The object can be anything such as a issue, work item etc. The function returns a Human readable description of the given object. The logic of how to summarize a particular object type is an internal implementation detail.

required_parameters.name: objects
required_parameters.description: List of objects or IDs of objects in str format to summarize

api_list.name: prioritize_work_items
api_list.description: Returns a list of objects sorted by priority. The logic of what constitutes priority for a given object is an internal implementation detail.

required_parameters.name: objects
required_parameters.description: A list of objects to be prioritized

api_list.name: add_work_items_to_sprint
api_list.description: Adds the given work items to the sprint

required_parameters.name: work_ids
required_parameters.description: A list of work item IDs to be added to the sprint.

required_parameters.name: sprint_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the sprint to which the work items should be added

api_list.name: get_sprint_id
api_list.description: Returns the ID of the current sprint

api_list.name: get_similar_work_items
api_list.description: Returns a list of IDs work items/issues that are similar to the given work item/issue. To know more about the works, use the summarize_objects API.

required_parameters.name: work_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the work item/issue for which you want to find similar items/issue

api_list.name: search_object_by_name
api_list.description: Given a search string, returns the id of a matching object in the system of record. If multiple matches are found, it returns the one where the confidence is highest.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: The search string, could be for example customerâ€™s name, part name, user name.

api_list.name: create_actionable_tasks_from_text
api_list.description: Given a text, extracts actionable insights, and creates tasks for them, which are kind of a work item.

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: The text from which the actionable insights need to be created.

api_list.name: who_am_i
api_list.description: Returns the ID of the current user, also represented by 'my' in the prompts
